entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Lévis
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:35 a.m. EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Beauport 11:00 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
Temperature: -2.7°C
Humidity: 64 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -8.5°C
Wind: ENE 28 km/h gust 39 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow or ice pellets. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning near noon then changing to ice pellets this afternoon. Local blowing snow this afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Freezing rain or ice pellets. Temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: Ice pellets changing to freezing rain this evening. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 11 this evening. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of rain or freezing rain. High 8.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to periods of rain or drizzle in the morning and ending late in the afternoon then cloudy. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. High 8. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
